title: Which graph represents Raven personality Big Five

content.question:
Raven is an artist who is relaxed, self-disciplined, and emotionally stable. She is very trusting and cooperative. She prefers staying at home to going out socially. Which of the following diagrams best represents Ravenâ€™s personality according to the Big Five trait dimensions?

N = Neuroticism

A = Agreeableness

E = Extraversion

C = Conscientiousness

O = Openness

choices.label: The figure presents a line graph in the first quadrant of a coordinate plane. On the horizontal axis the letters N, A, E, C, and O are indicated from left to right. On the vertical axis, Low is indicated near the origin and High is indicated near the top of the axis. The following 5 points are indicated on the line graph. N is near the bottom of the vertical axis. A is near the top of the vertical axis. E is about one third of the way up the vertical axis. C is two thirds of the way up the vertical axis. O is at the top of the vertical axis.

The figure presents a line graph in the first quadrant of a coordinate plane. On the horizontal axis the letters N, A, E, C, and O are indicated from left to right. On the vertical axis, Low is indicated near the origin and High is indicated near the top of the axis. The following 5 points are indicated on the line graph. N is near the bottom of the vertical axis. A is slightly farther up the vertical axis than N. E is slightly farther up the vertical axis than A. C is farther up the vertical axis than E. O is at the top of the vertical axis.

The figure presents a line graph in the first quadrant of a coordinate plane. On the horizontal axis the letters N, A, E, C, and O are indicated from left to right. On the vertical axis, Low is indicated near the origin and High is indicated near the top of the axis. The following 5 points are indicated on the line graph. N is at the top of the vertical axis. A is about one third of the way up the vertical axis. E is about two thirds of the way of the vertical axis. C is slightly farther down the vertical axis than E. O is slightly farther down the vertical axis than C, and below A.

content.answer: The figure presents a line graph in the first quadrant of a coordinate plane. On the horizontal axis the letters N, A, E, C, and O are indicated from left to right. On the vertical axis, Low is indicated near the origin and High is indicated near the top of the axis. The following 5 points are indicated on the line graph. N is near the bottom of the vertical axis. A is near the top of the vertical axis. E is about one third of the way up the vertical axis. C is two thirds of the way up the vertical axis. O is at the top of the vertical axis.

topic.text: 4.5: Social-Cognitive and Trait Theories of Personality
